revised_title: Obituary of Sir W. W. Abney: A Pioneering Figure in Photography and Science
tldr: This obituary celebrates the life and work of Sir W. W. Abney, a prominent figure in the fields of photography and science. Abney made significant contributions to the development of photography, including the creation of the first gelatine emulsion, which led to the modern concept of "instantaneous" photography. He also conducted important research on color vision, the transmission of light through the Earth's atmosphere, and the application of photography to the study of the solar spectrum. Abney's work had a lasting impact on the fields of photography, color vision, and spectroscopy.
